title: Bladi 2
content:
I re-designed my [Bladi One](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516060448/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/bladi-one-4f/) and now publish [Bladi Two](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516060448/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/4thfebruary/bladi-two-4f/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516060448im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bladi2_banner01_720x360_4920.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516060448im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bladi2_banner02_720x360_5429.png)
